hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.productdefinition.util.valueobjects.MasterObject(ps.offeringStatusId,lookupvalue.lookUpValue,ps.versionNo) from org.mifos.application.productdefinition.util.valueobjects.PrdStatus ps,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValueLocale lookupvalue where ps.prdType.productTypeID=:productTypeID and ps.status=:status and ps.prdStateId.lookUpValue.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId
